relationship.description: Denote a type that is in a relationship with another type- such as parent-child, sibling etc..

hierarchy.description: Denote a type that has an ordered relationship with other types

grouping.description: Denote a type that groups or otherwise connects other types

design pattern.description: Denotes a type that is one of a common design pattern

structure.description: Denotes a type that defines a structure or order to something, possibly other types

discriminator.description: Denotes a type that is used to differentiate between other types

factory.description: Denotes a type that is used to create another type

abstract.description: Denotes a type that is the abstract of another type

data structure.description: Denotes a type that is used in common  data structures

foundation.description: Denotes a type that is the foundation of other type

expansion.description: Denotes a type that expands on or adds to another type

product.description: Denotes a type that is the result of something

similar.description: Denotes a type that is a copy or a close transformation of a type

modification.description: Denotes a type that is a modification of something

reduced.description: Denotes a type that is less than, or a limited version of, another type

doing.description: Denotes a type that does something actively, possibly to another type

container.description: Denotes a type that contains something, possibly another type
